page.title: 11 NEWTON HALL FARM INTERVIEW
page.content: The present owner is Mrs.Macman,she bought the house and land in 1935.At the present moment there are 198 acres of land,20 acres of which are used by horses and the rest is arable land. Mrs.Macman began a riding stables with her daughter in 1960,but is now retired.The riding stables now have specal facilities for riding for the disabled and an indoor riding area for bad weather. The original Newton Hall was mentioned in the original Domesday Book,but was on a different site to the present day house.
